statements: DELETE FROM inventory_records WHERE current_stock_quantity <= 0 AND expected_stock_quantity > current_stock_quantity;
DELETE FROM inventory_records WHERE current_stock_quantity < expected_stock_quantity AND discrepancy_reason = 'Damaged';
DELETE FROM Discrepancies WHERE resolved = true;
DELETE FROM Discrepancies WHERE resolved = FALSE AND discrepancy_id = 10;
DELETE FROM InventoryRecords WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM inventory_records WHERE product_id = 100 AND current_stock < 10;
DELETE FROM resolved_discrepancies WHERE log_id = (SELECT log_id FROM discrepancy_logs WHERE discrepancy_date < '2022-01-01') AND resolution_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM InventoryRecords WHERE record_id = 100 AND location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM ProductDetails WHERE supplier_id = 500 AND unit_price > 100.00;
